extension.description:
This addon allows Kodi to read content from a Super Audio CD ISO image.
Super Audio CD (SACD) is a read-only optical disc format for audio storage, introduced in 1999, developed jointly by Sony and Philips Electronics to be the successor to the Compact Disc.
The SACD format offers more audio channels (e.g. surround sound), a higher bit rate, and longer playing time than a conventional CD.
extension.disclaimer: Playback seek is currently not possible.
